title: I bought a 3 day ip bosot and it only gave me 2 days
body: So im starting on a new account and I thought that I may aswell buy a XP and IP boost just so I could get my favourite champs and play ranked fast. So I bought the XP boost, then I bought the ip boost, I played a couple of games then went off. I came back on today to find I only have 1 day and 8 hours left of the ip boost but still 2 days and 7 hours left of the xp boost. I don't know what to do, can somebody help me?

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it looks like something weird happened here. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and provide a link to this post, we'll see what we can do.

Hi there!
If you have a problem like this one you should send a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
